main event: A man in McArthur, Ohio observed a bright, white object moving across the sky at an estimated 2.2 miles away on July 12, 1965.
interesting points: The object appeared to be like a 'flashlight in the sky', changing brightness at one point.
The object moved slowly and did not deviate from its course, leading the observer to initially think it was a satellite (ECHO I) before changing his mind and thinking it was a UFO.
The sighting lasted for around 15 minutes.
The observer did not conduct any measurements to estimate the size or speed of the object.
No photographs were taken of the object.
